localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Find the five differences in each of the countless varied pictures in a given time. With daily challenges, as well as recurring events on great themes. Train your brain and your attention in the addictive puzzle game and keep yourself fit.
blogPost.body: Find the five differences in each of the countless varied pictures in a given time. With daily challenges, as well as recurring events on great themes. Train your brain and your attention in the addictive puzzle game and keep yourself fit.
blogPost.title: Differences - A spot difference puzzle game
blogPost.author: LostVision Gamestudio

localize.description: 在特定的时间内，从无数张不同的图片中找到每张图片的五种不同之处。与每日挑战，以及伟大的主题的反复出现的事件。在上瘾的益智游戏中训练你的大脑和注意力，让自己保持健康。
localize.tagline: 一个点的差异益智游戏

localize.description: 在特定的時間內，從無數張不同的圖片中找到每張圖片的五種不同之處。與每日挑戰，以及偉大的主題的反覆出現的事件。在上癮的益智遊戲中訓練你的大腦和注意力，讓自己保持健康。
localize.tagline: 一個點的差異益智遊戲

previous.excerpt: MakeMyFund enables investors to build and invest in their own fully personalized efunds - without being experts in capital markets. The idea is to deliver 3%-5% higher returns than conventional mutual funds - most of this based on lower cost and tax savings.
previous.title: MakeMyFund - Personalized virtual equity fund

localize.description: MakeMyFund使投资者能够建立并投资于自己的完全个性化的电子基金--无需成为资本市场的专家。其理念是提供比传统共同基金高3%-5%的回报率--其中大部分是基于较低的成本和节税。
localize.tagline: 个性化的虚拟股票基金

localize.description: MakeMyFund使投資者能夠建立並投資於自己的完全個性化的電子基金--無需成爲資本市場的專家。其理念是提供比傳統共同基金高3%-5%的回報率--其中大部分是基於較低的成本和節稅。
localize.tagline: 個性化的虛擬股票基金

next.excerpt: Bazar is a curated platform of your favorite local artists, artisans, and merchants in the form of a mobile marketplace! Bazar Merchant serves a mobile Point of Sale capable of connecting to the Bazar Marketplace, where merchants can create and manage shops.
next.title: Bazar - Platform for local artists, artisans, and merchants

localize.description: Bazar是一个精心策划的平台，以移动市场的形式展示您喜爱的本地艺术家、手艺人和商家! Bazar商家服务的移动销售点能够连接到Bazar市场，商家可以创建和管理店铺。
localize.tagline: 本地艺术家、工匠和商人的平台

localize.description: Bazar是一個精心策劃的平臺，以移動市場的形式展示您喜愛的本地藝術家、手藝人和商家! Bazar商家服務的移動銷售點能夠連接到Bazar市場，商家可以創建和管理店鋪。
localize.tagline: 本地藝術家、工匠和商人的平臺
